description: This file contains CSS variables and styles for theme management in a React application. It defines light and dark theme colors and styles for various elements such as app layout, buttons, and responsive design.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container styling including alignment, background color, and color transition effects.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styling for the application including background color, alignment, and text styling.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application, defining their color and transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button, including positioning, background color, cursor, and hover/active effects.
